Posts.Content: Thanks Chuck. No the biopsy report did not have staging on it ( I examined the whole report and I guess I was a little surprised that it did not ). Yes I have been reading as much as I can on this forum, and it is an incredible resource! Thanks for the list above, it is a little overwhelming as my dad is more of a "take what the dr says" and I would rather do all the research and have as much info as possible for him to "help" to make an informed decision of treatment!

Posts.Title: Questions for surgeon

Posts.Content: Hi all, My father was diagnosed with prostate cancer at the end of November. Initially he was set up to do radiation because his urologist suggested this be the best course of action. After consulting with our family oncologist ( my mother has had lung and colon cancer ) he suggested that my dad may be a candidate for surgery and to go see Dr Patel located in Celebration, Florida since he is supposedly the leading surgeon for the davinci method. He has an appointment on Wednesday and basically I want to make sure we are prepared with the questions that we need answered. Any suggestions on what we should /need to ask would be helpful. Some history on my dad: Just turned 61. Has a blood coagulation issue that was discovered 1 year ago and on medication for his blood. This was discovered after having 2 strokes ( no lasting damage except some short term memory issues ). Other than that no medical issues. Initial abnormal DRE over the summer. PSA level increased from 2.8 ( I believe a year ago ) to 6.2 in September. Biopsy done 11/21/14. 12 samples taken 5/12 positive 3 samples 7 gleason ( 3+4) and 2 samples 6 gleason. % 5-50% in each sample Any feedback would be helpful. Thanks in advance!
Posts.Title: Questions for surgeon

Posts.Content: Just wanted to say thanks again, We met with Dr Patel and his team yesterday and my dad has decided to proceed with the surgery. After taking everything into consideration , we feel like this is his best option, with the # of positive cores and his age. All our questions were answered, in detail and myself my mom and dad felt as comfortable as we could be walking out of there. I believe Dr Patel has done the most of these Davinci surgeries in the world and we feel confident in his experience and his team.
